thread.section_title: Marrakech Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendliest Staff Ever
thread.title_full: Friendliest Staff Ever - Review of Marrakech Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bjrgeneva
title: Friendliest Staff Ever
text:
I travel a lot and I have never stayed at a hotel where every single person who works there is as friendly and happy with their jobs as at the Marrakech Hotel in New York City. To a person -- receptionists (day or night), cleaning staff -- every single person I came in contact with was friendly, committed to the hotel and very customer-focused. I would definitely go back again.
Room Tip: The only drawback is that the reception desk is one floor up from the street level -- and there are... See more room tips
